info.description: This is the backend API for TutorFlow Learning Management System.

get.summary: Get my submission for an assignment
Get all submissions for an assignment (instructor)

Request certificate for a completed course

get.summary: Get certificate data for PDF generation

parameters.description: Sort by: created_at, price, rating, students

get.summary: Get courses in a learning path

post.summary: Add a course to a learning path

put.summary: Reorder courses in a learning path

delete.summary: Remove a course from a learning path

get.summary: Get my progress in a learning path

post.summary: Mark all messages in a conversation as read
Start a conversation with a user

delete.summary: Unsubscribe all devices from push notifications

get.summary: Get VAPID public key for push subscription
Get my attempts for a quiz

Get rating summary for a course

parameters.description: Sort by (relevance, rating, price, students, newest)

get.summary: Get courses related to a specific course
Check if course is in wishlist

post.summary: Move course from wishlist to cart

description.description: Why this course is in the path

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and then your API key.
